level.description: The System Callstack Ordering is ready for debugging. Use the <color=#ffff00ff>PRINTER</color> tool to check the priorities array. Figure out where the bug is and use the BUGFIXER to catch it.
level.introtext: The final version of the Assigner sorts all numbers. Can you figure out what is wrong this time?
level.endtext: All the bugs have been found. You've fixed the System Callstack Ordering!
